DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) -Reverse Blot Hybridization Assay ( REBA ) identification nontuberculous mycobacteria ( NTM ) species acid-fast bacillus ( AFB ) smear-positive respiratory specimen .
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Identification Mycobacteria Acid-fast Bacilli Smear-positive Respiratory Specimens
